attributes.action: ban text talk and the use of numbers to abbreviate words
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Back when texting was a new phenomenon when we all had large mobile phones with small screens that had 2 or 3 lines, there was a minimum amount of characters you could use in a text 
Now its 2009 many years later our phones are like mini pcs and predictive text has a whole dictionary to use .... yet people still use "2" instead of to and "b4" instead of before and a whole complete dictionary of stupid abbreviations that take ages to decipher ..... its not necessary anymore ! and to make it worse people actually use these nonsensical words on the internet on social networking sites in posts and profiles .... for gods sake you have a qwerty keyboard in front of you, adsl2 and the internet is over 2000 terabytes you are not saving space or time... you are just annoying people .... 
Text talk should be banned and a heavy sentence opposed, like civil liberties being removed ie access to modern forms of communication
